      • check_get

        public int check_get(int date,
                     int pax,
                     java.lang.String Desire_status,
                     java.lang.String Target_status)
        return the allocated table ID, if not application return -1
        Parameters:
        date - the date-session that guests are arriving,
        pax - the number of people having meal,
        Desire_status - eg "vacated",
        Target_status - the status to be changed after the table is booked
        Returns:
        int the table ID, if there's no table suitable, return -1
